summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) regarding a letter to the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME) concerning Jeffrey Epstein's death. The email discusses the OCME's request to withhold the letter and a prior letter from disclosure, with plans to send it by the close of business.

events.title: Letter to OCME Regarding Epstein Death
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York drafts a letter to the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner concerning Jeffrey Epstein's death, with the OCME requesting that this letter and a prior one be withheld from disclosure.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) was drafting a letter to the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME) regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The OCME requested that both this letter and a prior letter be withheld from disclosure.
The email indicates planned communication with the OCME by the close of business on September 9, 2019.
